dia_chi: ['TNR Tower, Số 54A Nguyễn Chí Thanh, Phường Láng Thượng, Quận Đống Đa, Thành phố Hà Nội']
nganh_nghe: ['Ngân Hàng, Tài Chính, Công nghệ thông tin']
mo_ta_cong_viec:
['Trách nhiệm công việc
Tham gia phát triển các dự án chuyển đối số
Tham gia làm rõ nghiệp vụ, thiết kế giải pháp, phát triển nâng cấp hệ thống theo yêu cầu
Tham gia review thiết kế, review code, tối ưu hệ thống đáp ứng lưu lượng truy cập cao
Nghiên cứu áp dụng công nghệ mới nâng cao chất lượng, tối ưu nguồn lực phát triển
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Thành thạo Java Core, các framework Java như EE, Spring, Hibernate ... và một số design pattern thông dụng
Tư duy về thiết kế hướng đối tượng và nắm vững kiến thức về cấu trúc dữ liệu và giải thuật, lập trình hướng đối tượng ...
Thành thạo SQL, PLSQL, có kiến thức về các hệ quản trị cơ sở dữ liệu Oracle/MySQL, noSQL, có khả năng tối ưu CSDL
Ưu tiên có hiểu biết về nghiệp vụ tài chính, banking, có kinh nghiệm về microservices, ham học hỏi tìm tòi sáng tạo cái mới
Ưu tiên các ứng viên đã từng triển khai sản phẩm lên AWS
Ưu tiên các ứng viên đã từng sử dụng 1 số AWS products (AppSync, Batch, Lambda, EMR, Lake Formation, Glue, Fargate, API gateway, DynamoDB, ...) và 1 vài AWS components cho security, API and storage )
Ưu tiên các ứng viên sử dụng thành thạo Bitbucket, Jenkins, AWS CodePipeline
Ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm làm việc theo mô hình Agile/Scrum
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Tham gia những siêu dự án với vốn đầu tư 2000 tỉ đồng, ứng dụng những công nghệ mới nhất.
Được dẫn dắt bởi đội ngũ quản lý giỏi chuyên môn, đánh giá công bằng. Cơ hội làm việc trực tiếp với các đối tác hàng đầu thế giới (AWS; BCG; IBM; Temenos...).
Mức lương tháng tùy khả năng công việc: $1000 - $3000. Gói thu nhập từ 15 đến 20 tháng lương/năm kèm nhiều đãi ngộ hấp dẫn (Esop, vay ưu đãi, bảo hiểm sức khỏe cao cấp ..., thưởng dự án tùy vị trí công việc).
Nhiều chương trình đào tạo nâng cao kỹ năng, năng lực chuyên môn. Được tham gia chương trình Lãnh đạo kế cận (Talent Pool) khi nhiều năm có hiệu suất năm việc tốt.
Làm việc trong “Ngân hàng Chuyển đổi số tiêu biểu” được vinh danh 3 năm liên tiếp bởi Hiệp hội Ngân hàng và Tập đoàn dữ liệu quốc tế (IDG)
Văn phòng làm việc đẳng cấp theo mô hình Agile tiên tiến. Cơ sở vật chất, công cụ lao động tốt, cấu hình mạnh mẽ.']
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
Ngay từ khi thành lập, MSB đã ghi dấu ấn trong ngành Ngân hàng khi tiên phong ứng dụng Công nghệ.
Trải qua 30 năm hình thành & phát triển, MSB không ngừng tạo lập nhiều cột mốc mang tính đột phá trong ngành Tài chính - Ngân hàng:
2022, Đạt giải “Ngân hàng chuyển đổi số tiêu biểu” của năm 2021 do Hiệp hội Ngân hàng và Tập đoàn dữ liệu quốc tế (IDG) vinh danh.
2021, 02 siêu dự án: Digital Factory (DF); Core Banking và nhiều dự án Công nghệ khác thuộc Khối Công nghệ của MSB đã tạo nên một Tổ hợp Công nghệ lớn (MSB Digital Innovation). Tổ hợp này có nhiệm vụ mang tính chiến lược, định hình hoạt động của MSB trong thời gian 10-15 năm tới. Tính đến 2020, MSB đã đưa vào sử dụng gần 230 ứng dụng cùng nhiều công nghệ mới hiện đại (Cloud, Machine Learning, AI, Low code, vv…).
2019, MSB triển khai thay đổi toàn diện từ nhận diện thương hiệu đến mô hình trải nghiệm để trở thành ngân hàng đáng tin cậy, thấu hiểu khách hàng nhất & đạt lợi nhuận cao tại VN.
2018, MSB tiếp tục tiên phong trong việc ứng dụng công nghệ 4.0 & trở thành ngân hàng đầu tiên ứng dụng trí tuệ nhân tạo (AI) vào phát hành thẻ tín dụng & tích hợp thành công phương thức thanh toán QR code với 2 đối tác lớn là Vnpay & Payoo.

ten_cong_viec: ['Mid HTS (Home Trading System) Developer - Windows Desktop Application']
dia_chi: ['AP Tower, 518B Điện Biên Phủ, Phường 21, Quận Bình Thạnh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh']
quy_trinh_phong_van: ['Vòng 1: Interview with Tech Lead, CTO', 'Vòng 2: Salary Negotiation']
mo_ta_cong_viec:
["Trách nhiệm công việc
Develop HTS UI and business logic by using JavaScript under the Kiwoom platform
Work directly with remote team to clarify tasks and requirements
Develop new features based on the user requirements. (analyzing requirements and system design)
Fix the reported problems/bugs of the system during the integration test, the user acceptance test, and the test for maintenance (need to communicate with backend developers and testers)
Managing time and resources based on the WBS
Compile a weekly-report about the progress of tasks
Perform self-learning about a domain knowledge, write a report and conduct a seminar about it
Write high-quality, clean, elegant, maintainable, and testable code
Maintaining technical documents up-to-date Mentor junior developers and conduct technical training when needed
You will have the chance to be involved with each stage of different projects, to various aspects of software engineering and fostering your career growth.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Skill Required
Minimum 2-3 years experience on developing with Javascript.
Strong understanding of object-oriented programming and design pattern (MVC, MVVM).
Ability to write clean, easy to understand code.
Familiarity with version control systems, such as SVN.
Familiarity with issues tracking tools, such as Redmine.
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or relevant fields.
Able to communicate in English, written and spoken (processed by English interview).
Strong communication skills and teamwork, international experience is preferred.
Experience operating in an Agile environment, with a deep understanding of agile development principles.
Give Reference
Over 1 year of experience in developing securities solutions, including a PC-based trading platform – HTS(Home Trading System).
Experience on developing with MFC C++.
Experience on working with oversea team.
Mission
Supporting IT Development and Maintenance of the Stock Trading Platform developed based on the Kiwoom Framework for Kiwoom Indonesia, Finansia(in Thailand), and so on
SPECIAL OFFER
Providing training and education experience in Korea with Korean Finance/IT expert 
Providing opportunitites to work and support in IT/Finance fields overseas
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Competitive salary, salary review once a year
13th month salary and Annual Performance Bonus
MVP and Shining star awards at the end of year
Global and professional working environment
Full SHUI as Vietnamese Law
Premium Private Medical Insurance PVI and annual health check
15-day annual leave, Christmas leave and 30-mins menstrual leave for women
Company trip, YEP and monthly gathering time
Gifts on special occasion and fully stocked snack corner
Sponsored training courses and book purchase quarterly
Be well-equipped with new working equipment"]
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
DaouKiwoom Group has been one of the leading companies in Korea's IT and financial services with the total revenue of 2.2billion USD, profit of 1 billion USD and more than 5,000 employees in 2020.
We started as the 1st generation IT ventures, DAOU Tech in 1986, and successfully expanded into finance industry in 2000 through Kiwoom securities, No.1 Securities company in Korea.
So now as a group with a good balance of IT and finance, it is operating in Korea, Japan, China, France, Indonesia and Vietnam.
DaouKiwoom Innovation was founded in 2018 in order to bring various business activities in Vietnam with great experiences and capability of the best IT service in Korea.
In 2021, we are setting up our own R&D center to support our IT development projects from our subsidiaries in Korea. In our R&D business plan, we are focusing on projects related to the group's financial business as IT outsourcing business and development of our own platform in Vietnam by ourselves.

mo_ta_cong_viec:
['Eduvator is an Edtech company focused on personalized education. We aim to use technology to find the most suitable way of learning for each individual.
As Education Innovators, we honor creativity, passion, and the ability to speak up. Eduvator provides an open space where you can freely grow and challenge yourself to unlimited opportunities. If you are looking for a place to unlock your creative mind, do not hesitate to join with us.
As a part of our IT team, you will be responsible for brainstorming, designing, developing, and deploying applications and solutions that help our business in developing the community.
We are looking for a passionate, fully hands on back-end developer to work with our growing IT team. You will design and architect software features, working with designers, product/project managers, and solution architects to understand the features and implementation of the client-side structure.
Trách nhiệm công việc
Design and architect software features
Working with managers and team members understand the features and implementation of the website
Working with IT team to come up with new ideas and features to develop and improve internal product
Write clean code to develop functional APIs
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Troubleshoot and debug applications
Optimization of the application for maximum speed and scalability
Implementation of security and data protection
Set up and maintain project wiki/documentation.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
University Graduated, majoring in Computer Science, Information Technology. Especially graduated from University of Science, University of Information Technology - VNUHCM, Bach Khoa University, .. is a plus.
Min 2 years of experience in software development for enterprise solutions, especially in using NodeJS.
Has experience in NodeJS, and is familiar with ExpressJS. Apollo Server is an advantage.
Has good knowledge of SQL, NoSQL database, able to write complex query. MongoDB is an advantage.
Is comfortable or familiar with Docker.
Has good problem-solving skills and is well versed in string / array manipulation.
Good knowledge of git source control.
Can learn new technology quickly.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
OT paid rate up to 2.0, meal allowance, accommodation allowance, cummuting allowance ...
Provided with Macbook Pro M1/M2; Extra 4K Monitor
Contribution to Social, Health and Unemployment Insurance as per Law
Chance to work in a dynamic, flexible and open working environment
Promotions, training opportunities, and other benefits as per Company’s policies
Take part in team-building activities, company trips.
Working time: 9 am to 5 pm, Monday to Friday
Extra paid day-off']

thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
Công ty TNHH Soft Road Việt Nam là công ty chi nhánh 100% vốn của Công ty TNHH SoftRoad, có trụ sở chính tại Tokyo, Nhật Bản.
Công ty TNHH SoftRoad có trụ sở chính được thành lập vào năm 2001. Đây là công ty nâng cấp hệ thống AI chuyên nghiệp lớn nhất tại Nhật Bản. Công nghệ SystemReform, với tốc độ tăng trưởng trung bình hàng năm là 30%.
Khách hàng chiếm hơn 30% trong số 200 công ty hàng đầu của Nhật Bản. Công nghệ hàng đầu thế giới.
Công ty đã vượt qua chỉ số niêm yết trên Topix (tương đương với cổ phiếu China A), và đang mở rộng hoạt động kinh doanh sang thị trường Châu Âu và Châu Mỹ.
Công ty có hơn 30 nhân viên R&D cấp cao và hơn 350 nhân viên quản lý và phát triển chuyên nghiệp. Nội dung và trình độ công việc về cơ bản tương đương với các công ty phần mềm lớn nhất Nhật Bản như NEC và Fujitsu, và đồng hành khách hàng trong quá trình phát triển.
Với việc mở rộng kinh doanh và tiến sang thị trường Châu Âu và Châu Mỹ, Công ty TNHH SoftRoad Việt Nam được thành lập, trong thời gian tới nghiệp vụ chủ yếu khách hàng tại Nhật Bản, Châu Âu và Hoa Kỳ và các khu vực khác, mục tiêu là thiết lập vị thế của công ty nâng cấp hệ thống AI số 1 thế giới.

quy_trinh_phong_van: ['Vòng 1: Interview directly with Team Lead.', 'Vòng 2: Interview with CEO (if any).']
mo_ta_cong_viec:
["We are seeking an experienced and results-driven Mid-level/Senior Project Coordinator with at least 3-5 years of experience to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for overseeing the successful implementation of projects, ensuring they are delivered within scope, timeline, and budget. 
The ideal candidate will have a strong background in project management, excellent communication skills, and a proven ability to work with cross-functional teams. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to the growth and success of our product, SimpleMDG, by driving the successful execution of implementation projects.
Trách nhiệm công việc
Project Planning: Collaborate with stakeholders to define project objectives, scope, and deliverables. Develop detailed project plans, including timelines, resource requirements, and risk mitigation strategies.
Project Execution: Lead cross-functional project teams in executing project plans. Monitor project progress, identify and resolve issues, and ensure adherence to project milestones and deadlines.
Stakeholder Management: Establish and maintain effective relationships with internal and external stakeholders. Communicate project updates, risks, and issues in a clear and timely manner. Address stakeholder concerns and manage expectations throughout the project lifecycle.
Resource Management: Allocate and manage project resources efficiently, ensuring optimal utilization. Collaborate with team members and functional managers to secure necessary resources for project activities.
Risk Management: Identify project risks and develop risk mitigation strategies. Proactively monitor and manage risks throughout the project lifecycle, implementing contingency plans as needed.
Quality Assurance: Develop and implement quality assurance processes to ensure project deliverables meet established standards. Conduct regular project reviews and audits to identify areas for improvement and ensure project success.
Reporting and Documentation: Prepare and present project status reports to stakeholders, providing updates on project progress, milestones, risks, and issues. Maintain accurate and up-to-date project documentation, including project plans, schedules, and change requests.
Continuous Improvement: Identify process improvement opportunities and implement best practices to enhance project management methodologies and drive efficiency.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Strong fluency in English is a must, Japanese is a plus
The ability to work in the evening or early morning base on the project
Education: Bachelor's Degree in business administration, information technology, or equivalent experience
Experience: Minimum of 3 years of experience in project management, with a focus on implementing projects. Demonstrated experience managing projects through the entire project lifecycle. In absence of years of experience, certifications or past work may be used to show the level of experience needed to perform at this level.
Project Management Skills: Strong project management skills with a proven ability to deliver projects on time, within budget, and according to scope. Proficient in project management methodologies, tools, and techniques.
Leadership and Communication: Excellent leadership abilities with the capacity to motivate and inspire project teams. Exceptional communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to effectively communicate with stakeholders at all levels.
Quality Assurance: Develop and implement quality assurance processes to ensure project deliverables meet established standards. Conduct regular project reviews and audits to identify areas for improvement and ensure project success.
Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify issues, develop solutions, and make informed decisions.
Professionalism: Maintain a high level of professionalism in all interactions, both internally and externally. This includes exhibiting punctuality, meeting deadlines, and dressing appropriately.
Agile Learning: Demonstrate a willingness to learn new skills and adapt to changing project requirements. Be comfortable working in a fast-paced environment and embrace continuous improvement.
Technical Knowledge: Familiarity with project management software, collaboration tools, Microsoft Office Suite and Atlassian tools.
Industry Knowledge: Basic knowledge of the industry or domain relevant to the organization's projects is preferred.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
15 days of annual leaves
Competitive salary (+13-month salary include)  
Health insurance, social insurance according to the government regulations 
PVI Healthcare Insurance 
Have a chance to work in an international, friendly, open environment  
Annual Travel opportunity"]
thong_tin_cong_ty:

Laidon Group is a Certified SAP Silver Partner. We have been delivering solutions to enhance the SAP user experience since 1996.
We specialize in delivering SAP Fiori solutions to provide our customers with the best SAP UX.
We provide the expertise to guide you through your entire Fiori journey together with products to enable the delivery and management of first rate Fiori processes and apps.
Delivering Insight-to-Action KPI
Empowering enterprise users to access relevant tasks and activities on a single point of entry
Reimagine the SAP User Experience
We personalize and simplify the user experience (UX) for your SAP application.
Empower and Engage Enterprise Users with Mobility Solutions
Unleash mobility solutions by building beautiful native SAP Fiori UI’s by taking advantage of iOS and Android device features

mo_ta_cong_viec:
['Số lượng: 02
Trách nhiệm công việc
Lập test plan, viết test case, chuẩn bị dữ liệu và môi trường test.
Thực hiện kiểm thử, phát hiện lỗi và phối hợp với các developer để sửa lỗi.
Log bugs, đánh giá mức độ quan trọng và mức độ khẩn cấp của bug.
Phân tích và theo dõi kết quả test, báo cáo kết quả test.
Tham gia nghiên cứu và đề xuất các cải tiến các chức năng, quy trình kiểm thử sản phẩm.
Phân tích nghiệp vụ và lập test case.
Đào tạo, chuyển giao nghiệp vụ cho team CSKH và Vận hành ứng dụng.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Có từ 3 năm trở lên kinh nghiệm Tester.
Nhanh nhẹn, chăm chỉ, khả năng học hỏi cao, và có trách nhiệm trong công việc.
Nắm vững và hiểu biết sâu về quy trình Test, các kỹ thuật Testing.
Có kinh nghiệm Test trên một trong các nền tảng các ứng dụng Web, Web Application, Mobile Application là một lợi thế.
Có kỹ năng làm teamwork hoạt động đội nhóm tốt.
Ưu tiên những ứng viên có kinh nghiệm làm việc với phần mềm có tính nghiệp vụ cao.
Ưu tiên ứng viên có kỹ năng đào tạo.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Mức lương theo kinh nghiệm ứng viên: từ 13-20tr triệu/tháng.
Phụ cấp ngoài lương: Ăn trưa, gửi xe...
Được đóng bảo hiểm xã hội, bảo hiểm thất nghiệp, bảo hiểm y tế và các quyền lợi khác theo quy định của pháp luật.
Thưởng tháng: căn cứ vào chính sách của phòng ban.
Thưởng cuối năm: phụ thuộc vào hiệu quả công việc cá nhân, bộ phận và tình hình kinh doanh của công ty.
Thưởng đột xuất (thưởng nóng) nếu có hoàn thành tốt KPI.
Môi trường làm việc: Trẻ trung, năng động, được tạo điều kiện để phát huy tối đa năng lực, nhiều cơ hội thăng tiến.
Xét nâng lương định kỳ 1 lần/ năm và đột xuất nếu hoàn thành xuất sắc công việc.
Được xem xét tham gia chương trình ESOP để gắn bó lâu dài với công ty.
Được hưởng các quyền lợi và chế độ theo luật định (nghỉ lễ, BHXH, BHYT…), chế độ phúc lợi hàng năm của công ty.
Chế độ lương làm thêm giờ (OT) theo đúng quy định của pháp luật.
Nghỉ mát tại khách sạn 5 sao']
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
Tập Đoàn Công nghệ Quảng Ích
Tập Đoàn Công Nghệ Quảng Ích - QIG được thành lập trên cơ sở công ty cổ phần phần mềm Quảng Ích và các công ty con. Tập đoàn được hình thành với mục tiêu trở thành Tập đoàn công nghệ số 1 Việt Nam về các giải pháp công nghệ ứng dụng ở lĩnh vực giáo dục và các lĩnh vực có tính xã hội cao. Sau gần 20 năm hình thành và phát triển, công ty đã gặt hái được nhiều thành tựu và mang lại nhiều giá trị thiết thực cho các khách hàng, các sản phẩm và dịch vụ của công ty đã triển khai tới hàng triệu khách hàng trên toàn quốc.
Tầm Nhìn
Trở thành Tập đoàn công nghệ số 1 trong cung cấp các sản phẩm dịch vụ phần mềm cho giáo dục phổ thông tại Việt nam.
Xây dựng tổ chức với các giá trị tốt đẹp, văn minh và lan tỏa xã hội.
Sứ mệnh
Xây dựng hệ sinh thái phần mềm để chuyển đổi số toàn diện trong giáo dục phổ thông: Quản lý, Thư viện, Học tập và đánh giá, Kết nối nhà trường và gia đình.

Middle Cyber Security Specialist (3 positions)
Senior Cyber Security Specialist (2 positions)

Senior: 30-40+ million VND
Trách nhiệm công việc
Be a team member to develop a next generation of cyber security training tools based on videogames and AI technologies.
Develop game strategies towards cyber security training tools with integration of offense-defense security tools with antivirus, vulnerabilities analysis and exploits buildings blocks.
Manage the development lifecycle, from design and implementation to deployment and maintenance.

AI tools familiarity.
Performance Optimization: Solid skills in optimizing games and managing memory.

mo_ta_cong_viec:
["Cathay Life đang tìm kiếm thành viên mới về Huấn luyện viên AI tài năng để gia nhập đội ngũ năng động và đóng góp vào sự phát triển và triển khai nền tảng AI Coach. Là một thành viên quan trọng của phòng Phát triển Kỹ Thuật số, bạn sẽ sử dụng chuyên môn của mình trong phân tích dữ liệu, AI và học máy để nâng cao hiệu suất của tư vấn viên và thúc đẩy sự tăng trưởng kinh doanh.
Cathay Life is seeking a talented AI Trainer to join our dynamic team and contribute to the development and implementation of our AI Coach platform. As an integral member of Digital Development Department, you will leverage your expertise in data analysis, AI, and machine learning to enhance agent performance and drive business growth.
Trách nhiệm công việc
Sử dụng thống kê, học máy và các phương pháp khác để phân tích dữ liệu và phát triển các mô hình và mối tương quan.
Theo dõi nghiên cứu mới nhất và kết quả ứng dụng liên quan trong lĩnh vực AI và áp dụng vào thực tế kinh doanh.
Lập kế hoạch định hướng phát triển các sản phẩm AI dựa trên nhu cầu của người dùng và quy định của công ty.
Phân tích trải nghiệm người dùng để đảm bảo các sản phẩm AI dễ sử dụng và đáp ứng nhu cầu của người dùng.
Thu thập dữ liệu từ nhiều nguồn (hoạt động của các bộ phận liên quan, hệ thống nội bộ, cơ sở dữ liệu của công ty, trang web bên ngoài) và xử lý dữ liệu.
----
Use statistics, machine learning and other methods to conduct in-depth analysis of data and discover patterns and correlations.
Track the latest research and related application results in the field of AI and apply them to actual business side.
Plan the development direction of AI products based on user needs and company regulations.
Pay attention to user experience to ensure that AI products are easy to use and meet user needs.
Collect large amounts of data from multiple sources (such as relevant department operations, internal systems, company databases, external web pages) and organize them to ensure data quality.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Yêu cầu công viêc: 
Kinh nghiệm với các nền tảng AI hoặc AI đàm thoại là một lợi thế.
Đam mê tận dụng AI để thúc đẩy kết quả kinh doanh tích cực.
Thành thạo lập trình Python và các thư viện học máy có liên quan (ví dụ: TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn).
Yêu cầu bản thân:
Bằng cử nhân Khoa học Máy tính, Khoa học Dữ liệu, Thống kê hoặc ngành liên quan.
Ham học hỏi, trung thực, cẩn thận, nhạy bén với xu thế xã hội.
Kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề và phân tích dữ liệu.
Kỹ năng giao tiếp với các phòng ban trong công ty.
Tiếng Anh/ Tiếng Trung tốt là một lợi thế.
----
Job requirements:
Experience with AI-powered coaching platforms or conversational AI is a plus.
A passion for leveraging AI to drive positive business outcomes.
Strong proficiency in Python programming and relevant machine learning libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn).
Personal requirements: 
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, or a related field.
Inquisitive, honest, careful, sensitive to social trends.
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Good command of English/ Chinese be advanced
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
BHXH & Bảo hiểm khác/Social Insurance & Other Insurances
Du lịch/ Travel
Thưởng/ Bonus
Huấn luyện đào tạo/Trainning
Chăm sóc sức khỏe/ Health care
Chính sách review lương/Annual Salary Review
Phép năm/Annual Leave
Từ thứ hai đến thứ sáu: 8:30 – 17:30/ From Monday to Friday: 08:30am – 05:30pm"]
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
Công ty TNHH BHNT Cathay thành lập tháng 08 năm 1962, trực thuộc tập đoàn tài chính hàng đầu Cathay. Trong hơn 4 thập niên qua, với sự hỗ trợ đắc lực của hơn 26.000 nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, các cổ đông cùng mạng lưới khách hàng rộng lớn, chính sách chăm sóc khách hàng chu đáo, công ty BHNT Cathay đã luôn duy trì được mức doanh thu, tài sản và chính sách phát triển ổn định. Ngày nay, tại Đài Loan, công ty BHNT Cathay chính là thương hiệu số một trong ngành bảo hiểm nhân thọ.
CÔNG TY TNHH BHNT CATHAY VIỆT NAM: CAM KẾT CUNG CẤP DỊCH VỤ BẢO HIỂM VÀ TÀI CHÍNH ƯU VIỆT NHẤT CÙNG CHẤT LƯỢNG PHỤC VỤ HOÀN HẢO TRÊN MỌI PHƯƠNG DIỆN CHO NGƯỜI VIỆT NAM
Với mục tiêu trở thành tập đoàn tài chính vững mạnh nhất khu vực Châu Á, Công ty BHNT Cathay chính thức thành lập “Công ty bảo hiểm nhân thọ Cathay Việt Nam”, là công ty Châu Á đầu tiên được Bộ tài chính cấp phép hoạt động trong lĩnh vực bảo hiểm nhân thọ. Kế thừa lịch sử hơn 50 năm hoạt động thành công cùng quan niệm kinh doanh thực tế, nhiệt thành phục vụ theo phương châm “Luôn tôn trọng khách hàng, hướng tới một dịch vụ hoàn hảo”, công ty Cathay ngày càng khẳng định được vị thế của mình tại thị trường trong và ngoài nước, tự tin đưa dịch vụ của công ty từ Đài Loan vươn tới thị trường Việt Nam.
Bước đầu gia nhập thị trường bảo hiểm nhân thọ Việt Nam, Cathay sẽ tiếp tực duy trì chính sách kinh doanh ổn định vững mạnh, cung cấp dịch vụ bảo hiểm tài chính toàn diện, đồng thời thực hiện mục tiêu trở thành tập đoàn tài chính vững mạnh nhất khu vực châu Á.

mo_ta_cong_viec:
['ONE OF THE TOP ICT JAPANESE COMPANIES IN VIETNAM.
NEC Corp is a leader in the integration of IT and network technologies that benefit businesses and people around the world. NEC has more than 50 countries, 289 branches, and 117,418 employees worldwide. Under the company's corporate message of "Orchestrating a brighter world," NEC aims to help solve a wide range of challenging issues and to create new social value for the changing world of tomorrow.
Established in 2006, up to now, NEC Vietnam has grown with more than 200 employees in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City. We have been working hard to carry out many social contribution activities to bring more laughter and improve the quality of life.
Trách nhiệm công việc
Play a key role in leading and consulting the development team regarding the architecture and technology choices for the projects.
Lead, mentor and coach developers with best practices including coding standards, design patterns, unit tests, tests, and deployment.
Perform hands-on coding and code review for lower members' levels.
Understand the customer's requirements and business and utilize this knowledge to develop applications.
Stay up to date with the latest web development trends and technologies.
Willing to take business trips or work overseas.
Other assignments from the Manager.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Bachelor’s Degree in Software Engineering or a relevant major.
At least 10 years of experience in Frontend development including 3 years as a Technical Leader/ Technical Architect
Strong experience in Frontend development & Mobile application, using tech stacks like ReactJS, VueJS, Flutter, NextJS, etc.
Backend development experience with Java, .NET, and NodeJS is an advantage.
Experience in building a system from scratch; Knowledge of cloud services such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.
Strong experience in reviewing source code and managing a team of developers.
Experience in making specifications such as design and test specifications.
Familiar with software development life cycles such as Waterfall or Agile/Scrum methodologies.
Familiar with Japanese outsourcing/offshore processes.
Good communication in English (Japanese is a big plus)
Willingness to troubleshoot and solve complex problems.
Flexibility to adapt to changing instructions and requirements.
Strong leadership and team-building skills.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Sign-on bonus (1 Month-Salary): Until 31 March 2025
Working time: Mon-Fri, Hybrid working mode (WFH available)
13th Salary + Year-End Reward (a half month) + Excellent Bonus (up to 5 months)
Special allowance for foreign language certificate (up to 500USD/month)
Full social package (SI, HI, UI) with the company, and the law of Vietnam
Annual Health check at the top healthcare center
19 days of paid leave
Free Japanese class; 1:1 class with native teachers
Udemy account provided & Sponsor examination fee for technical certificates such as AWS, Azure, PMP, etc and get the incentive (up to 10M)
Many company activities to tighten the relationship between employees: Company trip, Year-end Event, Team building, Sports Day, Family Day, Outing Trip, etc.
Reward Most Valuable Player (MVP) for individual & team twice a year
Sports clubs provided (100% sponsored by the company): Football, Badminton
Professional environment with clear procedures and well-working facilities
Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments in Japan, APAC']
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
NEC established its liaison office in Vietnam in the early 1990s. In line with its growth strategy, it was re-organized as NEC Vietnam Co., Ltd. in 2006, with a newfound commitment to grow the business and contribute towards the people and society of Vietnam.
In a rapidly changing business environment, we have evolved to be a comprehensive solution provider, to deliver on our core strengths of providing Solutions for Society, which involves providing social infrastructure benefiting citizens and communities.
Today, we are highly dependent on ICT technologies. We are proud to say that NEC is well-positioned to meet the needs of the market, to have the relevant technologies in-house, and is ready to deliver.
We provide Solutions & Services, including:
1./ Software development (Offshore) for many clients from Japan & APAC Region (Singapore, Malaysia, etc.).
2./ System integrator in the field of:
Telecom Carrier Industry

mo_ta_cong_viec:
["We're growing our team again and are looking for more devs to join us launching our new app to the world. We're looking for talented devs interested in working with a product company.
About Us
In 2004, MenuWise (called MyRecipes back then) rocked the food service industry with an app which enabled users to do things they previously could only dream of. We gave New Zealand's professional chefs the power to cost any recipe in just minutes, as well as know the nutriton - something which was prone to error, was difficult, and used to take a long time.
While we made headlines, and were in fact SAAS pioneers, we didn't think much of this. For us, it was just the beginning of a mission which had only just begun.
Fast forward 20 years, (gee! where did that go?!) with the support of our users who love our app, we're on a new mission to take this to the world using cutting edge tech to do things even smarter, easier and faster.
You can see (and use) our legacy app at htps://menucoster.co.nz
Who we are
Our current team of 13 are based in Vietnam and the Philippines and are all incredibly passionate about what we do. We're very excited about what we are building and cant wait to release our new version. We follow agile methodology and love working together as a team.
Our team values and team culture revolve around:
Simplification over complication. Removing and decrypting jargon.
Efficiency and smart thinking over hard work.
Work-life balance. We all value local working hours and respect time away from work.
We celebrate the wins. And often.
Teamwork. Collaboration fuels our success. We all win together.
Innovation. We seek new ways to solve problems.
Delight. Usability is good, but delight is better. We aim to surprise and exceed expectations.
Communication. Above all else, clear communication keeps us aligned.
Who we are seeking
We are seeking a skilled Nest.js Developer proficient in TypeScript to join our dynamic team. You will play a crucial role in designing, implementing, and maintaining our server-side application using Nest.js.
Trách nhiệm công việc
Server-Side Logic: Develop all server-side logic, ensuring efficient data exchange between the server and users. 
Database Management: Define and maintain the central database, optimizing performance and responsiveness. 
Integration: Connect the application with other web services (open third-party) and seamlessly integrate front-end elements. 
Performance Optimizaton: Focus on performance enhancements, security measures, and code quality maintenance. 
API Development: Create robust APIs to support application functionality. 
Testing and Debugging: Conduct meticulous testing and debugging to uphold application integrity.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Experience 
Proficiency in TypeScript.
Database Knowledge: Excellent understanding of SQL particularly PostgreSQL. 
RESTful APIs: Familiarity with RESTful API design and implementaon. 
Version Control: Experience with code versioning tools (e.g., Git). 
Front-end Familiarity: Basic knowledge of front-end technologies. 
Server Deployment: Understanding of server deployment processes. 
Experience with unit tests. 
Basic understanding of Dev-Ops, particularly AWS
Search engine: eg Elastic search/ Typesense
English: we communicate in English and expect reasonable proficency to participate in standup etc. Great opportunity to improve your English.
Qualifications 
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Awesome team, no overtime, exciting product."]
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
MenuWise provides a web app used by the worlds best chefs to manage their recipes and menus smarter and faster.
Chế độ đãi ngộ
No overtime, fun team, a company who cares about people
Working time: Monday to Friday 8am to 5pm

mo_ta_cong_viec:
["About Us
At CJ OliveNetworks Vina, we drive digital transformation and innovation of space and daily life with our experience and know-how in successfully providing end-to-end IT service based on life and culture. Our mission is contributing to the growth and happiness of our employees and global community by creating customer values through ONLYONE digital experience.
Job Description
As a Java developer, you will be responsible for modernizing legacy systems, implementing new features for our SCM projects, converting .NET systems to Java (with support from the .Net team), delivering new functionalities, and ensuring system stability through automation and maintenance.
Trách nhiệm công việc
You will have an advantage if you have experience with systems such as:
Warehouse Management System (WMS).
Order Management System (OMS).
Transportation Management System (TMS).
Freight Management System (FMS).
Customer Management System (CMS).
System Modernization: Convert legacy systems from .NET to Java; upgrade existing features and create new functionalities using data-driven insights.
Feature Development: Develop new features based on requirements from Singapore clients. 
Full Development Lifecycle: Participate in planning meetings, development phases, and deliver scalable, high-quality solutions. 
Automation & Maintenance: Automate maintenance tasks using development tools and ensure system stability.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Java Development: Over 5 years of experience in designing and implementing Java-based solutions using Spring Boot to build Restful applications. 
Enterprise Project Experience: Hands-on experience with technologies such as Java, JSP, Spring Boot, Spring Framework, Spring MVC, JQuery, React.js, Jenkins, MyBatis, and Git. 
Database Management: Proficient in databases such as MSSQL Server, MySQL, DB2, Oracle SQL, MongoDB, including query writing, stored procedures, functions, index management, and performance optimization. 
Familiarity with debugging and performance tuning, along with a solid understanding of deploying, maintaining, and monitoring complex Java Web applications. 
Strong object-oriented analysis and design skills, understanding of design patterns and concepts. 
Ability to maintain, troubleshoot, fix issues, and update OSS security patches. 
Experience with open-source solutions and applying new technology skills to existing systems.
Core Competencies 
Communication, problem-solving, and time management skills. 
Ability to work effectively in teams and independently across multiple projects.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
1. Salary and Benefit
Attractive salary and benefits. Competitive Basic Salary; 13th Salary; Lunch, Gasoline and Telephone allowance; Incentive Bonus and annual salary review.
Premium Healthcare for you, 100% covered by the company. Annual medical checking up to USD 5,000 per year.
Full package: Full government social, health and unemployment insurance.
Extra bonus per personal event such as wedding, family’s funeral, birthday, newborn baby, etc.
Paid leave. 12 days per year and 01 day for Company Foundation day, long service leave.
Discount 40% for CJ's brands: CGV Cinema, Tous Les Jours, CJ Food, Meet Master, CJ Market, etc.
2. Working Environment
Working time: Monday – Friday. We work 40 hours per week.
English working environment: Chance to work onsite abroad and work on challenging GDC projects. Work closely with both Vietnamese and Korean experts.
Internal English/ Korean Class: Fully sponsored by the Company after working time.
Company trip and team building, football club, dinner party every month. We love playing teamwork games.
Free snacks, drinks (tea, coffee, etc.)."]
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
CJ OliveNetworks, a company that creates customer satisfaction and value through lifestyle-based IT services and continuous development of new technology.
Since its foundation in 1995, CJ OliveNetworks has achieved utmost customer satisfaction and value via successful offering of lifestyle based IT services such as manufacturing, distribution, logistics and media, leveraging steady growth of the company with customer trust and support. Based on numerous experiences and capabilities accumulated from building and providing IT systems and services, CJ OliveNetworks answers to needs of the market by leading the development of new technologies which corresponds to latest IT trends including open source, big data, Internet of things(IoT), cloud computing, security, and many others. CJ OliveNetworks promises to grow into a global ICT company through consistent challenges and innovations.

["About Us
At CJ OliveNetworks Vina, we drive digital transformation and innovation of space and daily life with our experience and know-how in successfully providing end-to-end IT service based on life and culture. Our mission is contributing to the growth and happiness of our employees and global community by creating customer values through ONLYONE digital experience.
Job Description
As a Shopify Senior developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining eCommerce sites on the Shopify platform. This role involves collaborating with various teams, troubleshooting issues, and continuously improving our Shopify-based products and processes.
Trách nhiệm công việc
Develop and maintain eCommerce sites on the Shopify platform, including themes, Liquid programming, and corresponding apps.
Extend Shopify platforms through the installation and setup of apps, integrating them into the customer experience.
Provide support to non-technical teams in the use of Shopify and its apps effectively.
Evaluate new technologies to improve products and processes, and contribute to internal projects related to Shopify.
Identify areas for site improvement, troubleshoot, and solve bugs as they arise.
Train other developers in app development skills.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
At least 7+ years of experience: Developing websites using PHP, relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL...).
Complete know-how of Shopify’s Admin System.
Strong programming knowledge of “Liquid” for Shopify Stores and Shopify Themes. Proficiency in HTML5 and CSS3 is also required.
Knowledge of PHP scripting language for building Shopify Apps, and familiarity with JSON REST API with Auth.
Proficiency in front-end development technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, and CSS.
Knowledge of Google Analytics for Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) is desirable. Expertise in Google Content Experiments is required for testing purposes.
Demonstrated strong understanding of at least one modern JS framework/library: ReactJS, VueJS, NextJS, AngularJS, etc.
Fluent in business English with effective communication skills to interact with customers.
Strong interpersonal skills: Ability to interact with stakeholders from multiple teams effectively.
Willingness to adapt flexibly to changes in clients' requirements and urgent requests.
Strong team building, conflict resolution, and performance evaluation skills.
Strong issue-resolution skills: Ability to identify and address challenges promptly and effectively.
Optional Requirements:
4+ years of experience working with Shopify.
Expertise in creating web designs and user interfaces (UI).
Proficiency in developing payment gateways and inventories.
Knowledge of other popular eCommerce platforms such as Magento, WooCommerce, and BigCommerce.
Ability to code review and mentor junior/mid developers.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
1. Salary and Benefit
Attractive salary and benefits. Competitive Basic Salary; 13th Salary; Lunch, Gasoline and Telephone allowance; Incentive Bonus and annual salary review.
Premium Healthcare for you, 100% covered by the company. Annual medical checking up to USD 5,000 per year.
Full package: Full government social, health and unemployment insurance.
Extra bonus per personal event such as wedding, family’s funeral, birthday, newborn baby, etc.
Paid leave. 12 days per year and 01 day for Company Foundation day, long service leave.
Discount 40% for CJ's brands: CGV Cinema, Tous Les Jours, CJ Food, Meet Master, CJ Market, etc.
2. Working Environment
Working time: Monday – Friday. We work 40 hours per week.
English working environment: Chance to work onsite abroad and work on challenging GDC projects. Work closely with both Vietnamese and Korean experts.
Internal English/ Korean Class: Fully sponsored by the Company after working time.
Company trip and team building, football club, dinner party every month. We love playing teamwork games.
Free snacks, drinks (tea, coffee, etc.)."]
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
CJ OliveNetworks, a company that creates customer satisfaction and value through lifestyle-based IT services and continuous development of new technology.
Since its foundation in 1995, CJ OliveNetworks has achieved utmost customer satisfaction and value via successful offering of lifestyle based IT services such as manufacturing, distribution, logistics and media, leveraging steady growth of the company with customer trust and support. Based on numerous experiences and capabilities accumulated from building and providing IT systems and services, CJ OliveNetworks answers to needs of the market by leading the development of new technologies which corresponds to latest IT trends including open source, big data, Internet of things(IoT), cloud computing, security, and many others. CJ OliveNetworks promises to grow into a global ICT company through consistent challenges and innovations.

Excellent Communication skills with ability to lead and coordinate among team members.

Experience in using test automation tools such as Selenium, Cypress, JUnit, etc

Experience using CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, GitLab CI, etc.

Develop business requirements via in

Analysis of multiple projects in the capacity of a Business Analyst. 
Conduct an in-depth analysis of the Vietnam AI market and trends to facilitate the planning of new projects. 
Cultivate relationships and partnerships with key stakeholders, comprehending and negotiating the needs and expectations of various stakeholders. 
Furnish project-level analysis, including the creation of essential project analysis documentation (business requirements, system requirements, scoping, use cases, sequence diagrams, proposals for future states, etc.).

dia_chi: ['FPT Complex Building, Nam Kỳ Khởi Nghĩa, Phường Hoà Hải, Quận Ngũ Hành Sơn, Thành phố Đà Nẵng']
mo_ta_cong_viec:
['FPT Automotive is part of FPT Corporation, specializing in providing software services and solutions for automobiles. It is a leading partner for dozens of the world’s largest car manufacturers from Japan, South Korea, the United States, Canada, and more. FA boasts a team of experts with decades of experience in C/C++ programming and the development of embedded systems for automobiles.
Trách nhiệm công việc
Embedded Development: 
Design, develop, and optimize embedded software for automotive applications.
Implement software components based on AUTOSAR architecture and ensure integration with ECUs.
Collaborate with hardware engineers to ensure seamless integration between software and hardware components.
Debug and troubleshoot software to resolve development and operational issues.
Participate in code reviews and adhere to industry standards, including MISRA and AUTOSAR guidelines.
Testing and Validation:
Create, execute, and maintain unit and integration tests for software components and ECUs.
Analyze test reports, provide feedback, and report bugs to the software and system teams.
Execute Polyspace to identify and fix issues related to MISRA coding conventions.
Use CANoe and CAPL scripts to simulate CAN messages for testing purposes.
Manage and automate test scripts to support continuous integration and deployment.
Configuration and Simulation:
Configure AUTOSAR Basic Software (BSW) and manage integration into the system architecture.
Simulate real-world scenarios to validate the performance and reliability of embedded systems.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Experience:
At least 1 year of experience in Automation Testing and Embedded Development for Automotive software.
Proven experience in developing and testing embedded software components for ECUs.
Technical Skills:
Strong coding skills in C/C++ for embedded systems.
Proficient in AUTOSAR architecture, BSW configuration, and integration.
Experience with Polyspace for code analysis and compliance with MISRA coding standards.
Proficient in CANoe and CAPL scripting for CAN message simulation.
Familiarity with managing and automating test scripts for continuous integration.
Language Skills:
Good at English.
Preferred Skills:
Knowledge of additional automotive testing tools and frameworks.
Familiarity with automotive safety standards (ISO 26262, ASPICE).
Experience in debugging embedded software and hardware integration issues.
Nice to have:
Experience in the automotive industry or with embedded systems.
Knowledge of Lean practices and other Agile frameworks (e.g., Kanban, SAFe).
Experience working in a global or multicultural environment.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Be part of our hugely international environment; we are currently working for Japanese projects, where you can have many opportunities to working overseas.
Competitive salary package based on skills and experience
Awesome social events and parties for employees
We create great teams and take very good care of them
Great opportunity to grow with the company
Frequent staff activities and company parties
Awesome social events and parties for employees
20% discount on school fee if your sons/ daughters join FPT School
Udemy/ ELSA PRO accounts for every employee & Udacity accounts for Managers.
Special offer for senior level:
Relocating package: Up to 100M (for senior candidates from Hanoi/HCM.C to Da Nang City).
Loan support: 4% interest rate (1 – 2 Billion VND package).']
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
FPT Software là công ty thành viên thuộc Tập đoàn FPT. Được thành lập từ năm 1999, FPT Software hiện là công ty chuyên cung cấp các dịch vụ và giải pháp phần mềm cho các khách hàng quốc tế, với hơn 28000 nhân viên, hiện diện tại 27 quốc gia trên toàn cầu. Nhiều năm liền, FPT Software được bình chọn là Nhà Tuyển dụng được yêu thích nhất và nằm trong TOP các công ty có môi trường làm việc tốt nhất Việt Nam.
+1

mo_ta_cong_viec:
["The Systems Compliance Administrator I is responsible for managing, monitoring, and maintaining Windows patch levels on servers and workstations, diagnosing and troubleshooting Windows patching and SCCM/Intune client errors, and ensuring compliance levels based on Tenable reports provided by Sec OPS. This role works closely with the global compliance team, focusing on identifying compliance breaches and applications requiring updates in the Vietnam environment. It's crucial for maintaining the integrity and security of the IT environment while also supporting business operations.  The role requires flexibility to support pre-scheduled after-hours or weekend work and support.
Trách nhiệm công việc
Manage, monitor, and maintain Windows patch levels on servers and workstation OS 
Diagnose, troubleshoot, and resolve Windows patching and SCCM and Intune client errors 
Manage, monitor, and maintain all 3rd party programs on servers and workstations and keep them in compliance 
Manage, monitor, and maintain compliance levels based on Tenable reports provided by Sec OPS 
Diagnose, troubleshoot, and resolve issues with Patching, SCCM Client Failure, and Intune client issues 
Reporting and Communication: Prepare regular reports on compliance status. Present findings and recommendations to local leadership and the Senior Manager, Regional IT (APAC). Foster open communication channels within the IT team and across departments.
Assist in conducting basic risk assessments to identify potential compliance risks.
Maintain documentation related to compliance standards, including policies, procedures, and audit records.
Contribute to the continuous improvement of compliance processes and systems.
Additional Responsibilities:
Inform Leadership of recurring Incidents.
Performs other duties as assigned.
Complies with all policies and standards.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
2+ years’ experience with:
Windows server/workstation OS troubleshooting to the component level
Microsoft SCCM/Intune troubleshooting
Diagnose, troubleshoot, and resolve issues with patching on servers and workstations.
Direct or indirect problem determination and resolution
1+ years Experience with:
Patch My PC.
Remediation of out-of-date software
Autopilot in a Hybrid Environment preferred.
Intune and Azure (EntraID)
Tenable 
Able to use Microsoft Office Applications at a high level.
ITIL4 Foundation Certification desired.
Exceptional organisational skills and time management skills. 
Able to communicate good in English.
Personal Skills:
Must be self-motivated, team oriented and possess strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Candidate should possess strong organisational skills, be detail oriented, and self-motivated with a demonstrated ability to problem solve.
Strong sense of urgency and strong commitment to quality customer service is required.
Ability to analyse and interpret data (metrics) to improve the delivery and support of services to our customers. 
Well-honed analytical skills and logical thinking required for solving practical problems and dealing with a variety of variables in complex situations.
Solid technical acumen and a fundamental grasp of IT principles are essential for effectively navigating and resolving complex technical challenges.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
From Monday to Friday
International Travel opportunities
13th month and productivity bonus
Free lunch, parking, uniforms
Yearly company trip
Healthcare insurance package
24/24 Personal Accident insurance
Free English training programs (Cambridge English Scale) at office
Continuing development of technical and soft skills through working and formal training
Trade Union & Staff Social Club - Sport clubs (Yoga, Swimming, Badminton, Football, Gym,...)
Good working conditions and environment"]

Về chúng tôi
MiTek® is a global company focused on providing integrated software, services, engineered products and automated solutions for the building industry worldwide. Innovating and expanding into aspects of global building, MiTek® empowers customers to improve the way they design, make and build.
Join MiTek and work on software used around the world!         
The MiTek Vietnam software team is looking to grow and we want you!  We can give you the opportunity to work on large existing software used around the world where you can expand your skillset and work with many different technologies.

quy_trinh_phong_van: ['Vòng 1: Quản lý trực tiếp + HR', 'Vòng 2: CTO']
mo_ta_cong_viec:
["As a Senior Java Backend Developer at OPES Insurance, you will play a crucial role in building and developing core systems and insurance business software to support the company's operations. Your responsibilities will include ensuring seamless integration and stable operation of systems between OPES and its business partners.
Trách nhiệm công việc
1. Design & Develop Software Systems:
Collaborate with team members to design and break down application modules and functions based on business requirements.
Build databases that meet business needs.
Develop and maintain backend applications for web platforms.
Integrate with middleware APIs to ensure end-to-end interaction flow.
2. Support Application Transfer:
Train and transfer knowledge about the developed/deployed software systems to relevant units.
3. Handle System Errors and Issues:
Receive, fix, and timely upgrade applications when errors arise or when there is a need to upgrade product features.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
1. Educational Background:
Bachelor's degree in Information Technology (IT) or related fields.
2. Relevant Knowledge/Expertise:
Proficient in Java Spring & Hibernate.
Strong understanding of relational databases and proficiency in SQL.
Additional knowledge/expertise is an advantage (preferred):
JavaScript, Node.js/React.js framework.
Understanding and experience with client-server model and microservices architecture.
Knowledge and experience with Big Data, Elasticsearch, and Kibana are a plus.
3. Skills:
Strong analytical, design, programming, and deployment skills for applications and software services.
Proactive in learning and implementing new technologies.
Open to changes or completely redoing projects when required.
Teamwork skills and ability to read and understand English technical documents.
4. Relevant Experience:
At least 3 years of experience in software system development.
Preferably experienced in the insurance sector or involved in programming system projects in the insurance field.
Experience in project-based work, especially with Big Data, Data Analytics, OCR, AI projects is a plus.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Full salary during the probation period.
13th-month salary + performance bonus + holiday bonuses.
Comprehensive welfare package: Social insurance, OPES Care health insurance for employees and their families, lunch, transportation, and phone allowances.
Preferential loan support for OPESers from VPBank (home loans/consumer loans).
Personal development guidance and support through annual IDP programs.
Balanced work schedule focused on efficiency: 5 working days/week (off on Saturdays and Sundays). Annual leave from 14 to 21 days (based on seniority).
A youthful, dynamic working environment with corporate cultural activities, team building, and travel events."]
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
Ra đời từ 2018, Công ty Cổ phần Bảo hiểm OPES mang trong mình DNA vượt trội, luôn tiên phong ứng dụng các giải pháp công nghệ cao để cung cấp những sản phẩm số hóa, đơn giản, tiện lợi và được cá nhân hóa, cũng như luôn sáng tạo & đổi mới để cải tiến sản phẩm và dịch vụ.
Tầm nhìn: Trở thành nhà Bảo hiểm số Tiên phong & Sáng tạo nhất
Sứ mệnh: Tiên phong trong ứng dụng công nghệ để nâng cao chất lượng cuộc sống cộng đồng bằng các sản phẩm bảo hiểm số đơn giản, tiện lợi
Năm 2022, đánh dấu sự kiện OPES trở thành công ty con của Ngân hàng TMCP Việt Nam Thịnh Vượng (VPBank), sau khi VPBank nâng tỷ lệ sở hữu vốn tại OPES trên 90%. Là công ty thành viên trong hệ sinh thái của VPBank - Top 3 tại Việt Nam & Top 100 tại châu Á với hơn 26 triệu khách hàng, OPES không ngừng mở rộng hợp tác với các đối tác bao gồm cả trong & ngoài hệ sinh thái VPBank, ở đa lĩnh vực như: ngân hàng, tài chính, bảo hiểm, công nghệ, dịch vụ đa phương tiện, vận chuyển, bất động sản...
Để chuẩn bị cho sự phát triển mạnh mẽ của OPES trong giai đoạn tới, OPES luôn sẵn sàng chào đón những nhân sự có năng lực, phẩm chất, hệ giá trị phù hợp để đồng hành, phát triển và tận hưởng nhiều niềm vui tại OPES.
Với hệ giá trị cốt lõi: Khát vọng – Chính trực – Hiệu quả – Kỷ cương – Sáng tạo, hãy cùng OPES tỏa sáng tài năng của bạn.

ten_cong_ty: ['Công ty TNHH chứng khoán NH Việt Nam (NHSV)']
dia_chi: ['Lotte Center HàNội, Tầng 9, Toà tháp Đông, 54 P. Liễu Giai, Phường Cống Vị, Quận Ba Đình, Thành phố Hà Nội']
quy_trinh_phong_van: ['Vòng 1: Phỏng vấn trực tiếp với Trưởng phòng IT, trưởng phòng nhân sự.', 'Vòng 2: Phỏng vấn với đại diện Ban tổng giám đốc']
mo_ta_cong_viec:
["Trách nhiệm công việc
Implement a strategy on quality assurance and service quality of the technology department to ensure products and services operating as intended.
Lead efforts to enhance and make the testing process more efficient and increase coverage of automated testing.
Work with the project team or in-house development team to define the testing detail of each application. 
Define the testing schedule to ensure the application working as the expectation of business users and meet the compliance of the business requirements. 
Manage the testing activities included requests for testing of new solution, patch and/or upgrade. 
Act as the internal control of SLA compliance on user requests. Play the role as primary escalator for those requests breaching the SLA compliance. 
Determine and manage the service improvement within IT areas. 
Conduct service survey once a week to determine areas for improvement within the technology department.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
University or college degree in IT, Computer Mathematics or related subjects
Minimum 3 years’ experience majority on quality assurance
Understanding of  quality assurance.
Experience on securities trading system is a must.
Business analysis experience on deriving the project requirements is an advantage. 
Experience using and mentoring on the use of MS Project and MS Project.
Good presentation, written and verbal communication skill.
Communication skills, communication confidence, team work, good customer relations
Ability to work independently, under pressure and large.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Competitive salary and bonus worthy of ability, 13th month salary, holiday and Tet bonus
Fully guaranteed benefits according to labor law (social insurance, health insurance, unemployment insurance are paid with full salary)
Work in a professional, friendly, modern environment.
Annual health check-up regime.
Health and accident insurance.
Participate in the Company's training programs."]
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
Công ty TNHH chứng khoán NH Việt Nam ( NHSV) là một công ty con 100% vốn thuộc NH Investment & Securities, một trong những công ty chứng khoán lớn nhất Hàn Quốc, cung cấp các dịch vụ tài chính, bao gồm quản lý tài sản, ngân hàng đầu tư, môi giới thông qua 79 chi nhánh, PGD trong nước và nhiều chi nhánh, công ty con trên toàn cầu  Chúng tôi luôn không ngừng tìm kiếm những người đồng hành phù hợp để cùng nhau xây dựng một NHSV ngày càng phát triển và bền vững.
Chế độ đãi ngộ
Lương, thưởng cạnh tranh xứng đáng với năng lực, lương tháng 13, thưởng Lễ, Tết.
Được đảm bảo đầy đủ các chế độ theo luật lao động (BHXH, BHYT, BHTN được đóng full lương)
Được làm việc trong môi trường chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện, hiện đại.
Chế độ khám sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm.
Chế độ bảo hiểm sức khỏe và tai nạn. 
Được tham gia các chương trình đào tạo của Công ty.

dia_chi: ['19-21 Tân Cảng, Vista Building, Phường 25, Quận Bình Thạnh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh']
nganh_nghe: ['IT Consultant, Outsourcing, Dịch vụ IT, Dịch vụ']
quy_trinh_phong_van: ['Vòng 1: Communication + English test', 'Vòng 2: Technical test']
mo_ta_cong_viec:
['Trách nhiệm công việc
Demonstrate good communication skills in supported languages, as well as technical knowledge of Microsoft products, to effectively communicate with Microsoft consumers via phone and email.
Produce high-quality documentation and distribute it to the appropriate team members and technical lead.
Sticks to service responsibilities to reach high performance standards.
Comply with Microsoft Code of Business Conduct and strictly follow data privacy guidelines in all customer communications and interactions with Microsoft – never put customer PII at risk.
Kỹ năng & Chuyên môn
Have at least 1 year’s working experience in Global customer-facing roles.
Excellent spoken English is a must.
Excellent customer service skills
Passion and desire to develop in the IT industry
Available for rotation shifts.
Phúc lợi dành cho bạn
Competitive salary depending on experience
90% contribution of the gross salary to social insurance from the company side
Full salary during the probationary period
12 days of annual leave, 8 days of sick leave
Annual Health Checkup
For employees working night shift: PVI insurance cover 24/7, night shift meal allowance and 30% allowance on gross salary
Working 5 days a week with 2 unfixed days off (Schedule will be arranged by Head of Department)']
thong_tin_cong_ty:
Về chúng tôi
About us
iTechwx is newly born in the summer of 2022 in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. We locate in Binh Thanh District, settling the office inside Opal Tower. As the first stop in SEA region, iTechwx encounters Vietnam, and particularly the city of Ho Chi Minh because of the richness in human resources, as well as the prospecting technology industries in this robust city.
We see opportunities - specifically to the sector of cloud solutions and managed IT services. We believe a One-Stop Digital Transformation Service is the solution to most enterprises. iTechwx is specialized in agile recruiting, designated training, and managing services to drive exceptional quality in delivery. iTechwx is also empowered to incubate technical talents. We invent highly efficient training, mentoring, onboarding, and quality assurance processes, incorporating with the essence of customer services. We see the city is awaiting to practice the most to succeed.
We invest on the talents. iTechwx commits to carefully treat each employee, and to forge a company brand full of vitality. Employees in iTechwx always find easy access to company resources. Teams are supplemented with supporting groups to take care of employee work experience.
